markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Big Game Trapper](/Feats.aspx?ID=3426) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 81</row>

**Archetype** [Game Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=169)

**Prerequisites**
[Game Hunter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3425); [Snare Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=843)

</column>

---

You can set snares specifically for big prey, leaving smaller creatures unscathed. Each time you set a snare, you can choose Small, Medium, Large, or Huge. That snare can be triggered only by creatures of that size or larger.
name: Big Game Trapper
